After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.EXPLANATION: Total number of at-home repair service requests received over a specific period, indicating the demand for at-home repair services.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.FORMULA: Total Number of At-Home Repair Requests Received

After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to respond to at-home repair service requests from the time of request to initial contact, reflecting responsiveness to customer needs.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Respond to At-Home Repair Requests

After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with at-home repair services.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the at-home repair service experience, including service quality, timeliness, and overall satisfaction, gathered through surveys and feedback.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for At-Home Repair Services

After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.EXPLANATION: Percentage of at-home repair service requests completed compared to the total number of requests received, reflecting the success of fulfilling repair requests.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.FORMULA: (Number of Completed At-Home Repairs / Total Number of At-Home Repair Requests) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from at-home repairs.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from at-home repair services compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.FORMULA: (Revenue from At-Home Repairs - Cost of At-Home Repairs) / Cost of At-Home Repairs * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each at-home repair service provided, including labor, parts, and overhead expenses.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.FORMULA: Total Cost of At-Home Repair Services / Total Number of At-Home Repairs

After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.KPIS: Compliance with at-home repair service standards.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.EXPLANATION: Degree to which at-home repair services adhere to established service standards, measured through audits and performance evaluations.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant At-Home Repairs / Total Number of At-Home Repairs) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.KPIS: At-home repair service improvement initiatives success rate.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.EXPLANATION: Percentage of improvement initiatives for at-home repair services that achieve their objectives, based on project outcomes and effectiveness.
After Sales+Mobile Services+At-Home Repa.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Improvement Initiatives / Total Number of Improvement Initiatives) * 100
